documents.name: Final Study Report - Bridging Academia-Industry Gap to achieve Self-reliance

documents.description: Examines the impact of DPCO 2013 on pricing, availability, and affordability of medical devices for industry and consumers.

documents.description: Analyzes the patent cliff in pharmaceuticals and various pricing methodologies for drugs going off-patent.

documents.description: Explores strategies to upgrade NIPERs to meet global pharmaceutical business standards and aim for top world rankings.
